text: Allāhtāṉ vāṉaṅkaḷaiyum pūmiyaiyum paṭaittavaṉ. Avaṉē vāṉattiliruntu maḻai poḻiyac ceytu, ataik koṇṭu uṅkaḷukku uṇavāka(p paṟpala) kaṉivarkkaṅkaḷaiyum veḷippaṭuttukiṟāṉ. (Nīṅkaḷ payaṇam ceyyum poruṭṭut) taṉ kaṭṭaḷaiyaik koṇṭu kappalai uṅkaḷ iṣṭappaṭi kaṭalil cella vaikkiṟāṉ. Āṟukaḷaiyum, (kālvāykaḷaiyum) uṅkaḷ viruppappaṭi pāya vacatiyaḷittāṉ
